text: int main ( ) { int tc ; scanf ( "%d" , & tc ) ; while ( tc -- ) { int n , j , max ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int arr [ 100 ] = { 0 } ; scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ 0 ] ) ; max = arr [ 0 ] ; for ( int i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { int res [ 100 ] = { 0 } , x ; scanf ( "%d" , & x ) ; res [ 0 ] = arr [ 0 ] + x ; for ( j = 1 ; j < i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & x ) ; res [ j ] = arr [ j ] + x ; if ( arr [ j - 1 ] > arr [ j ] ) res [ j ] = arr [ j - 1 ] + x ; } scanf ( "%d" , & x ) ; res [ j ] = arr [ j - 1 ] + x ; for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { arr [ i ] = res [ i ] ; if ( arr [ i ] > max ) max = arr [ i ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , max ) ; } return 0 ; }
